content.text:
# 27th Golden Eagle Awards

The 27th Golden Eagle Awards () took place in Changsha, Hunan, China, on October 12, 2014.
Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" | Best Television Series
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" | Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
*Jiao Yulu
*Find the Path
| valign="top" |
* 'Zhao Baogang–To Elderly With Love
* Liu Jiang–Let's Get Married
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" | Favorite Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" | Favorite Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* Wang Luoyong–Jiao Yulu
* Zhang Jiayi–The Police Story in Yingpan Town
* Lin Yongjian–Nie Rongzhen
* Chen Yiheng–Under Changbai Mountains My Family
| valign="top" |
* Liu Tao–To Elderly with Love
* Sun Li–Hot Mom!

* Wang Weiwei–Angel Heart
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" | Best Art Direction
